blogPost.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
blogPost.body: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
blogPost.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

previous.excerpt: Beatflyer is the most powerful social media posts creator with a wide-range of effects which can also sync to the music. Import your designs, design from scratch, or start from one of the crafted templates.
previous.title: Beatflyer 2.0 - Social media posts on steroids

localize.description: Beatflyer是最强大的社交媒体帖子创建者，具有广泛的效果，也可以同步到音乐。导入你的设计，从头开始设计，或从精心制作的模板之一开始。
Beatflyer是最強大的社交媒體帖子創建者，具有廣泛的效果，也可以同步到音樂。導入你的設計，從頭開始設計，或從精心製作的模板之一開始。

next.excerpt: Can't spend thousands of dollars on premium fonts and tired of using the same plain Google fonts as everyone else? Fontshare brings a collection of high quality fonts 100% Free for both Commercial & Personal Use.
next.title: Fontshare - High quality fonts 100% free for commercial and personal use

localize.description: 不能花费数千美元的高级字体，并厌倦了使用相同的普通谷歌字体作为其他人？Fontshare带来了高质量的字体集合100％免费的商业和个人使用。
localize.tagline: 高质量的字体，100%免费供商业和个人使用。

localize.description: 不能花費數千美元的高級字體，並厭倦了使用相同的普通谷歌字體作爲其他人？Fontshare帶來了高質量的字體集合100％免費的商業和個人使用。
localize.tagline: 高質量的字體，100%免費供商業和個人使用。
